idea:
Main Objects

1.To carry on the business of providing manpower placement and recruitment services, selection, interviewing and training of all types of Executives, Middle Management Staff, Junior Level Staff, Workers, Labourers (Skilled / Unskilled) required by various Industries and organizations, including providing security services, Labour Contractors, Industrial, Commercial, Housing and other security services, Office Management Services, payroll outsourcing and management, registers and records and remittance management services and such other Corporate Support Services.

2.To provide consultancy, advisory and execution services with respect to the abovementioned matters, including but not limited to, the Labour Law and Regulatory Compliances in respect thereof.

3.To manufacture, process, prepare, preserve, bottle, buy, sell and deal, whether as wholesalers or retailers or as exporters or importers or as principals or agents in the mineral water and packaged drinking water segment.
name: AA'SPIRE AUXILIARIES SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
EWHEELS HUB LLP is incorporated on 25th November, 2021 with LLP Act 2208 having registered office At A 2, Ground Floor, Mitradham, Sarvoday Nagar, Nahur Road, Mulund West, Dist Mumbai, Maharashtra 400080 IN.

To carry on the business of:

1. Designing, development, customization, implementation, maintenance,

testing, trading, selling, distributing, marketing, commissioning,

supplying, licensing of Computer/ Mobile/ Web based applications,

softwares and/or programmes to electric vehicle(s) owners/ suppliers/

vendor/ aggregators.

2. Manufacturing, installations, commissioning, supply, trading of

charging station/ points for electric vehicle(s) using electricity

generated through solar energy or any other renewable or nonrenewable

sources of energy.

3. Manufacturing, trading, leasing, renting of all Electric Vehicle(s)

including but not limited to Electric Bicycle, E-Cart, Electric Cars,

Electric Buses, Electric Heavy weight Vehicles or any other similar kind

of vehicles that can be charged through Solar Energy or electricity

generated through any renewable/non-renewable source of power.

4. Manufacturers, importers exporters, buyers, sellers, distributors,

dealers, sub-contractors, repairers, agents of all kinds of machines,

tools, dies, jigs, fixtures, patterns, designs, plants, apparatus, utensils,

hardware materials, plastic goods, implements, spare parts, accessories

and components of all description related to charging station whether

electrical, mechanical or otherwise.
name: EWHEELS HUB LLP

idea:
Arrow Duoports is a company formed by three co-founders with a goal of creating unique partnerships that provide customised logistics solutions resulting in value added services for our clientele.

Our ability to adapt to market changes, create new trends and provide tailor-made solutions will continue to allow us to identify and execute key strategies.


Vision - Our vision is to continue operating and exploring, innovative, reliable opportunities in shipping industry. Our focus will always be on the safety for our people, to protect the environment and to ensure the best quality of our services.

â€‹

Mission - To be honest, upright, stay united in purpose and fellowship,

treat everyone with respect, strive for mutual advantage and

contribute to human progress
name: Arrow Duoports

idea: To promote organic farming in a sustainable manner and to explore domestic and global market for the organic products we either produce or trade. Major emphasis is on attempts to improve living standards of small and marginal farmers through fair trade practices. As a company we are bound to extend our presence worldwide as a leading producer and supplier of genuine and certified organic products with superior quality.
name: MIRACLES NATURAL AGROCRAFTS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
NISHKAIV Solutions LLP is a FinTech start-up focusing on services in System Integrations, Artificial Intelligence and Internet of Things. 


Technical Service Provider for Account Aggregator


Enterprise Service Bus at various banks in India using WSO2, Kafka, Redis, IBM tools etc.


API Banking at major banks in India


Cross Border Inward Foreign Remittance for major banks in India


Microservices based Middleware for NBFC


Technical Architecture revamping using Micro Service Layer at Pharma domain


Technical Solutioning for Life Insurance Companies in India
name: NISHKAIV SOLUTIONS LLP
